Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute at California/Foster
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via: Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and California, due to, street blockage, near California/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and California, due to, street blockage, near California/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.
